item.title: Transport v1.10.1.20
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.10.1.20
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 15 Aug 2025 14:04:42 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.10.1]
#130 Fix LockinTime saving multiple TDMS files upon startup (@pgwijesinghe)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: JSON-Schema v0.2.0.9
item.description:
Product: JSON-Schema v0.2.0.9
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Tue, 12 Aug 2025 23:35:03 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for converting LV objects into JSON Schema

Release Notes: #2 fix Creat JSON Schema (Interactive).vi button logic
#3 fix schema formatting of cluster and nested clusters
#4 fix converting table data to json datatypes (converts to numeric rather than string)
- add tools for building and stripping JSON $Path
- recursively inspect schema to table and vice versa (useful for nested clusters)
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.25.1.23
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.25.1.23
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 11 Aug 2025 19:08:48 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.25.1]
#54: update plot legends after start button is pushed
#113: fix bug inside AO clipping that output number of channels equal to number of devices (rather than 2 channels per device for 4461)
#114: relabel calibration indicator

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.25.0.22
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.25.0.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:03:28 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.25.0]
#16, #17: control input and output terminal configuration from UI window.
- Also configurable from setDAQ API
#95: Per Channel AO Limits (AC and DC)
- note also that DAQ settings are not configurable per channel rather than per device

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
